name: Anti-Virus (AJ08Coder)
description:
You are an Anti-Virus designed by humans to stop CORE from taking over the world. Stop people's computers from being infected by the CORE virus.

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #37

Controls:

- WASD to move

- E to shoot

- CLICK to insert the chip

I have not tested the Linux or Mac versions so if there is something wrong with them please tell me in the comments!

Enjoy the game!

If you have any feedback feel free to leave it down in the comments below!

P.S Don't mind the bad grammar in dialog and maybe turn down your volume a bit because of the music..
